title: An Innocent Heart: A Supernatural Mystery Thriller
description: HIS MIND WAS SCREAMING, I DIDN'T DO THIS! I'M INNOCENT! BUT THE WORDS WOULDN'T COME OUT. In the near future, Texas legislates that death row inmates have the right to choose to donate their organs after the state executes them.Unaware they are recipients of one such donor, Jake and Libby find themselves haunted by an identical, recurring, horrific nightmare.They meet at for the first time at a heart/lung transplant support group, and when Jake shares his dreams, this leads Libby to suspect they might have the same donor. Jake, ever the skeptic, doesn’t believe her ... until a supernatural force compels him to reconsider.The pair then embark on a journey to solve their shared nightmare’s mystery and bring a murderer to justice.
author: Vikki Mount
